Text: Can you upload Merlin complete season?

Season 5 of Merlin starts Sept 29.  Are you going to up it as it shows?  If so, where?

cheers!

@funpigj: Merlin wasn't aired nor shot as HiDef till last season, and that one I encoded just because of request from good friend. Honestly, I don't have good opinion about that series and combined with inability to encode regularly, as I did before, I am afraid how Merlin would stay out... Sorry, my friend. Regarding your "Where?" question - I have not exact answer. I know how much my small-sized encodes of TV series mean to some of you - but I cannot do it as I have done before and you should look for alternatives. My computer is too old and I must prevent loosing it because it's only thing I have.
